1.title: Unobtanium Ore Fragments
1.description: Rare mineral said to make ships faster, shields tougher, and captains richer. In practice, mostly used as a very expensive paperweight.

2.title: Encrypted Datacore
2.description: Pulled from a smuggler’s wreck. Could contain secret hyperspace lanes, forgotten recipes, or embarrassing holo-logs. Decryption not guaranteed.

3.title: Stabilized Antimatter Canisters
3.description: Safe for transport, unsafe for juggling. The kind of cargo that makes insurance brokers sweat.

4.title: Xenon Energy Cells
4.description: Enough power to keep your thrusters humming, your coffee hot, and your karaoke system dangerously loud.

5.title: Mysterious Crystal Shards
5.description: They glow, hum softly at night, and sometimes whisper. Great for powering weapons… or unsettling your crewmates.

6.title: Telepathic Fish Eggs
6.description: Drop one in your ear and suddenly everyone speaks your language. Side effects may include mild slime and existential dread.

7.title: Cosmic Mix Tape (Indestructible Edition)
7.description: A relic from a long-lost pilot with questionable taste in music. Plays flawlessly even in vacuum — assuming you own a zero-G turntable.
